short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DitDah Player is a Chrome extension that allows you to play the selected text in Morse code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DitDah Player is a Chrome extension that allows you to play the selected text in morse code.

This will help amateur radio operators improve thier Morse code receiving skills.

It also supports Japanese Morse code, but it can only translate ruby-annotated text.
